fdd:FDD.titleName: Profile 1 for JPEG 2000, Part 1, Core Coding

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:fullName: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2000. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system, Amendment 1, Codestream Restrictions (2002), Profile 1 (formal name); JPEG 2000 Profile 1 (common name)

fdd:description.p: Implementation of JPEG 2000 Core Coding (Part 1) that constrains the use of variables in the specification ("restricts the codestream") but has been designed to serve most commercial applications. One restriction limits image tiles to 1,024 pixels in each dimension; another limit (shared with profile 0) requires that the low resolution element in the image (LLD; the "D" is a subscript) also be 128 pixels in each dimension, facilitating the rapid construction of a thumbnail by most decompressors.
Additional general information about JPEG 2000 profiles is provided in the Notes to J2K_C.

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:shortDescription: Implementation of JPEG 2000 Core Coding (Part 1) that constrains the use of variables in the specification (restricts the codestream) but has been designed to serve most commercial applications. One restriction limits image tiles to 1,024 pixels in each dimension; another limit (shared with profile 0) requires that the low resolution element in the image (LLD; the "D" is a subscript) also be 128 pixels in each dimension, facilitating the rapid construction of a thumbnail by most decompressors.

fdd:relatedTo.fdd:titleName: JP2 File with JPEG 2000 Core Coding, Profile 1

fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:documentation: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2000. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system, Amendment 1, Codestream Restrictions (2002)
fdd:sustainabilityFactors.fdd:adoption: The compiler of this document has not found information that characterizes the extent of adoption of J2K_C_Profile_1; Comments welcome.

fdd:stillImageQF.fdd:clarity: See J2K_C. It is possible albeit unlikely that some of the profile 1 constraints would limit clarity; Comments welcome.

fdd:filenameExtension.fdd:note: Extension for raw codestreams; see also JP2_FF

fdd:other.fdd:tag: Indicator for profile, level, version, etc.

fdd:values.fdd:note: The profile indicator is the Rsiz value in the SIZ marker segment.
